description:
This module provides state‐of‐the‐art training in
Internet GIS technologies and spatial theories for
mapping and comprehending activities in virtual
space, real space, and the intersections of the two
spaces. It sees Internet as an integral part of social life
and provides students a venue to explore the
implications of the digital transformations brought
forth by the Internet. Major topics that will be
covered include 1) web‐based GIS mapping, 2)
Internet of Things, 3) social sensing and social web,
and 4) social dynamics of the Internet.
title: Internet GIS
